name: Not Enough WiFi
description:
Our submission for the 2021 GMTK game jam. We decided to interpret the theme "Joined Together" as the intimate connection between laptop and wireless internet.

Play as employee! Deliver the files before the deadline or you get fed to sharks.

Use your laptop to locate the WiFi signal to speed up the upload.

Team:
Mirey Bejarano - 3D art and level design
Elias Kouwenhoven - Programming / blueprints
Karol Tanalska - 2D art, textures, character designs

Special thanks:
Laars - Emotional support
Darren - Spiritual support (did not contribute anything but it's ok)
Kaleb - Support
